about_the_game:
DESCRIPTION:

A unique level-based third person obstacle course with shooter elements. This game boasts a non-procedurally generated environment with high attention to detail. Set in a densely-filled post-apocalyptic city, the player is tasked with traversing across the destruction in order to reach the extraction zone where you will be airlifted to safety. Along the way, rescue as many survivors as you can, and kill any sewer mutants that have taken over what's left of the city.

TECHNICAL DETAILS:

The game is kept fresh with 3 difficulty settings that alter the course in a number of ways, each one being unlocked by the completion of the previous. An extensive library of 100 playable characters is available from the very beginning, comprised with both male and female options.

NPC's have generated voice acting, delivering funny lines when saved!

WHAT TO EXPECT:

- Unlocked frame-rate.
- Optimized for disk space.
- 4k quality.
- Banging music by Tim Beek.
- Continued support and updates.
- Discord community.
- Zero micro-transactions.

DISCLAIMER:

- This is not an endless runner, however the game does adopt similar elements.
- We have chosen not to implement controller support given that both speed and accuracy in the shooting parts of the game are essential, and become increasingly more difficult.

Set in a densely-filled post-apocalyptic city, the player is tasked with traversing across the destruction in order to reach the extraction zone where you will be airlifted to safety. name: Extract Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400 CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 CPU @ 2.90GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Omg zombies!! Wait!.. Not zombies?! But it's the apocalypse..?.. Oh, we're doing sewer mutants..! Is that a thing?.. I thought we were doing zombies.. no? oh... YAY SEWER MUTANTS!!
